text:
You’re not the only one who loves a good deal. It turns out celebrities get the same rush from finding a great product at a great price. Want proof? Just look to some of the latest celebrity red carpet beauty looks.

Celebs who wore inexpensive makeup on the red carpet include some major names, like Nicole Kidman, Kerry Washington, and Angelina Jolie. Many of these stars proudly boasted about their bargain products on Instagram, giving makeup junkies insight into which products to score from the drugstore. Consider this list your definitive guide to affordable makeup that celebrities wear, with red carpet makeup products ranging from $5–$19.99.

From lipsticks to eyeshadows to nail polish, these are the very best bargains on the red carpet. Vote up your favorites, and get ready to bring some of that Tinsel Town magic into your own look.
title: Red Carpet Products You Can Actually Afford
